item.title: Creating simple Python server container
item.description: As we did for Go and Java, where is was possible to create an Dockerfile starting from “scratch”, the goal of this post is to create a python base server container with a minimum about of packages (debian and python) to reduce the security exposure of the container as well as the image size.
